thread.title: Tired Hands and Pa. punk rockers Pissed Jeans team up for new ‘People Person’ brew
thread.title_full: Tired Hands and Pa. punk rockers Pissed Jeans team up for new ‘People Person’ brew

author: Nick Vadala
title: Tired Hands and Pa. punk rockers Pissed Jeans team up for new ‘People Person’ brew
text: Entertainment Tired Hands and Pa. punk rockers Pissed Jeans team up for new 'People Person' brew Ardmore's Tired Hands Brewing Company is bridging the gap between music and beer with "People Person," their upcoming collaboration brew with Allentown punk rockers Pissed Jeans - plus a live show with the band, to boot. Tired Hands and Pa. punk rockers Pissed Jeans team up for new ‘People Person’ brew
